title: The list of all Protected Occupiers and those held eligible in appeal proceedings shall be obtained from all concerned departments of S
clause_text: The list of all Protected Occupiers and those held eligible in appeal proceedings shall be obtained from all concerned departments of S.R.A. by the officer drawing the lots. So also such officer shall obtain a copy of plans along with number of rehabilitation tenements per floor from the technical department. The Protected Occupiers evicted forcefully shall also be considered for allotment.
section: ALLOTMENT OF THE TENEMENTS TO THE PROTECTED OCCUPIERS

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
